text: hi everyone today i will share with you
a collection of easy vegan eggplant
recipes that even eggplant skeptics will
be worn over if you want something
savory nutritious and slimming you can
choose between these four recipes let's
begin
let's start with some grilled eggplant
and mushroom skewers it's so simple to
make but the flavors gonna impress you
definitely a great meatloaf option for
your next bbq party rinse a few pieces
of king oyster mushrooms and cut into
sticks about 2 inches long and 1 8 inch
thick soak in salted water for about 5
minutes and then rinse well cut eggplant
lengthwise into thin slices toss with a
teaspoon of salt and leave to sit for
about 10 minutes they will become softer
more flexible and easier to roll then
rinse well to get rid of the salt next
heat up some vegetable oil in a pan add
some chopped green onions or leek and
saute until fragrant add a pinch of salt
and transfer to a bowl next in a small
bowl crush one cube of fermented bean
curd add one and a half tablespoon of
sugar 2 tbsp of the fermented bean curd
brine a tablespoon soy sauce half a
tablespoon of vegan oyster sauce
tablespoon of hot sauce and stir well to
combine next saute some mince leek the
white bar only until fragrant and then
add the king oyster mushrooms then add 2
3 of the sauce stir well and cook for
about 3 to 5 minutes until cooked
through then transfer to a plate to cool
lay out a slice of eggplant place a few
sticks of king oyster mushrooms on top
needed to one end roll up tightly and
put on skewers and brush with some leek
oil then grill over charcoal or in an
airfryer at 180 degrees celsius for
about 10 minutes occasionally brush the
sauce all over the surface as the
mushrooms is already cooked you don't
need to grill for too long serve on a
plate with a garnish with the slick oil
wow it smells so good and packed with
flavors rich savory and delectable you
can serve this at least or over rice so
good next is stir-fry eggplant with
mushrooms and basils a very simple dish
we can show off how great flavor
combinations can make up an amazing dish
just a fresh light and sumptuous vegan
dish cut quinoa the mushrooms crosswise
into thin slices then rinse well with
salt water and drain season the mushroom
with a tablespoon of soy sauce mix well
then add a tablespoon of cornstarch toss
well to coat the mushroom with the
starch next cut eggplant lengthwise in
half then cut on a bias into bite-size
pieces
soak in salted water to prevent
darkening detach the asian basil from
the stem and rinse well
next heat up some oil in a pan quickly
seal the eggplant on all sides transfer
to a bowl
add some oil in the pan and saute the
seasoned mushrooms until slightly
charred on both sides and transfer to a
plate
next add some more oil in the pan and
saute some minced garlic and the white
part of mince leak add a handful of the
asian basil leaves stir on high heat for
about 30 seconds to release the
fragrance then return the sauteed
mushrooms and eggplant back to the pan
season with one and a half tablespoon of
soy sauce a tablespoon of cooking wine
half a tablespoon of sugar and half a
tablespoon of sesame oil transfer to a
serving plate and serve with hot steamed
rice what a perfect flavor combination
that you should definitely give it a try
when it comes to eggplant salad you
can't miss out this korean eggplant
salad recipe made with really simple
ingredients this has become one of the
favorite side dishes of korean cuisine
to pick eggplant chew the ones with
brighter color plum and not wrinkly cut
into 3 inch length then cut each part
lengthwise into 6 pieces quickly boil
the eggplant about 3 minutes in boiling
water use a mesh strainer to push them
down making sure that they are fully
submerged in the water then drain and
leave to cool
finely dice about a quarter cup of onion
finely mince up three large cloves of
garlic in a bowl combine the diced onion
the minced garlic one and a half
tablespoon of soy sauce half a
tablespoon of sriracha two tablespoons
of sesame oil and a tablespoon of hot
chili flakes and mix well toss the
cooked eggplant with the sauce and enjoy
the dish smell amazing of sesame oil the
eggplant is tender and melts in your
mouth and with the kick of the hot
pepper flake this could be a great
appetizer or side dish that everyone
will love finally is crispy eggplant
with oyster sauce cotted in the
beautiful shiny glaze
crispy on the outside soft tender and
naturally sweet on the inside it's a
really great vegan substitute to the
famous chinese takeout sweet and sour
pork
cut eggplant into thumb size pieces then
coat with a tablespoon of tempura butter
spray with some water and toss well to
coat then spray with some more water add
1 to 2 tbsp of tempura butter toss well
to coat a thin layer of butter outside
each piece each vegetable oils until you
see bubbles appear around the chopstick
standing into it deep fry the eggplant
until golden brown and then drain off
the excess oil
next i'll take some mince leek and dried
chilies until aromatic add a tablespoon
of sugar a tablespoon of vegan oyster
sauce a tablespoon of soy sauce and a
tablespoon of sriracha and mix well when
the sauce is combined add the crispy
fried eggplant and toss well toss well
to coat the eggplant with the sauce
garnish with some chopped green onions
and serve with a bowl of steamed rice
i wish you success with all these
amazing vegan recipes from eggplant
send me a photo if you give them a try
and don't forget to subscribe to my
channel for more amazing recipes like
these i will see you then next time bye
[Music]
